property.name: dfs.http.address0
property.description: The address and the base port where the dfs namenode web ui will listen on for avatar zero. If the port is 0 then the server will start on a free port.

property.name: dfs.http.address1
property.description: The address and the base port where the dfs namenode web ui will listen on for avatar one. If the port is 0 then the server will start on a free port.

property.name: dfs.name.dir.shared0
property.description: Determines where on the filer the AvatarNode zero should store the name table(fsimage).

property.name: dfs.name.dir.shared1
property.description: Determines where on the filer the other instance of the AvatarNode one should store the name table(fsimage).

property.name: dfs.name.edits.dir.shared0
property.description: Determines where on the filer the other instance of the AvatarNode zero should store the transaction (edits) file.

property.name: dfs.name.edits.dir.shared1
property.description: Determines where on the filer the other instance of the AvatarNode should store the transaction (edits) file.

property.name: dfs.persist.blocks
property.description: Determine if every block allocation is persisted to edit log
